name: Amazing Hexa Classic: Puzzle G
description:
Amazing Hexa Classic: Puzzle Game is a new style puzzle game that challenges your brain. Drag blocks to fill up the Hexa to win and collect stars to unlock Levels. Easy to play and pleasurable game for all age.

Features:
HD graphics.
No time pressure.
Hints to help you pass levels.
Nice music and sound effect
Completely Fullscreen
